job_history.work_description: Employee Relations/Conflict Resolution and Policy/Process guidance. Initial workforce hiring, pre-acquisition due diligence and post-acquisition HR integration. Completed 2 days of onboarding process every week. Managed and updated personnel files for old and new hires in the Human Resources Information System database (Lawson). Assessed and streamlined training coach program to drive consistency of company's processes. Fostered a teamwork environment conducive to positive dialogue across the organization. Personal efforts were cited as a great driving force behind DC employee-retention rate within an industry where high turnover is the norm. Saved company thousands of dollars every month by reducing reliance on employment agencies. Brought the majority of formerly outsourced recruiting functions in-house to reduce billable hours. Completed our distribution's weekly reporting while assuring it was sent to corporate in a timely manner. Oversaw 300+ associates pay, onboarding, and relocation to other departments and facilities. Assured managers sent in time details report for their direct reports. Upon received it would be revised daily to make any necessary revisions in Kronos. Took part in various meetings ranging from union sensitivity training, hr meetings regarding program rollouts, staffing meetings, and concluding final decisions on any investigation that took place Unemployment claims and meditation were completed with a 94% success rate. Provided various resources to associates. Including work number information, tuition reimbursement access, and information on how to adjust form of payment. Managed all aspects of leave administration, and health benefits for over 300 employees. Created various spreadsheet & documents to streamline efficient workflow. Provided support and assistance to management team on handling and resolving Human Resource issues. Interviewed, counseled and terminated employees to provide exceptional performance and a safe / motivating workplace.

Oversaw 200 employees. Filled out applications & inserted in the COATS software. Interviewed, counseled, and terminated employees to provide exceptional performance and a safe / motivating workplace. Assure all employees are present every shift and on time in the beginning of the shift and when they come back from any breaks. If absent needed to have justified reasons for missing or provide warning. Upon employment I needed to learn the warning system Park West operated on. Assure all employees are following protocol when handling art pieces and tools. Looking out for the safety of employees. All employees had to have proper uniform & equipment to operate efficiently. Kept files up to date with employee information in the software system & excel template. Had to provide documentation when employees want to request vacation time or refused medical attention which I created. Kept proper documentation of employees excused absences, vacation requests, refusal of medical attention, & file of accident / incident report. Inserted employee hours & pay rate on Excel sheet.

Responsible for maintaining 250 files. According to the file I would start up or continue the mitigation process with lender on behalf of client's. Photocopied, verified, & faxed paperwork. Prepared packages, spoke with lenders and clients. Submitted various forms and documents on client's behalf to lenders in hopes of receiving a modification. Answered various calls at a time and solved all questions and concerns in a timely matter.

skills.name: Human Resources Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in HR roles, including employee relations, conflict resolution, policy guidance, and workforce management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Handled employee relations, conflict resolution, and policy guidance in multiple roles, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Managed recruitment processes, including onboarding, and reduced reliance on employment agencies, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Streamlined training coach program to drive consistency of company processes, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Oversaw large teams, managed employee performance, and provided support to management teams, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with employees, management teams, and clients, showing strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple tasks, including employee onboarding, payroll, and reporting, indicating strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Used Microsoft Office tools, including Excel, to manage employee data and create reports, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: HR Software
skills.explanation: Used HR software, including Lawson and Kronos, to manage employee data and payroll, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Conflict Resolution
skills.explanation: Effectively resolved conflicts and mediated disputes, indicating strong proficiency in conflict resolution.

skills.name: Negotiation
skills.explanation: Negotiated with lenders on behalf of clients, showing a solid working proficiency in negotiation.
